full_summary:
# Portable Telescoping Antenna Masts and Mast Kits Tender Announcement

## Overview

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the provision of Portable Telescoping Antenna Masts and Mast Kits. The required delivery address is Defence Research and Development Canada – Ottawa Research Centre.

## Goods and Services Requirements

DND requires six (6) Portable Telescoping Antenna Masts and six (6) Mast Kits, consisting of components to the Portable Telescoping Antenna Masts. The procurement is open to all eligible suppliers. Suppliers are requested to refer to the RFP for detailed requirements.

## Procurement Details

* The procurement is governed by the Request for Proposal (RFP) and any amendments thereto.
* Evaluation criteria will include a comprehensive review of the proposal and the price offered by the bidder.
* The DND intends to award a single Contract for this requirement.
* Bidders are required to submit their proposals in either official language of Canada.
* Suppliers are free to negotiate with DND through various procurement activities.

## Additional Information

* The procurement is based on the Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is not subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement.
* There is no security requirement applicable to the Contract.
* Delivery of goods is required within two (2) months after Contract award.

## Documents

Documents pertaining to this procurement are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/).

## Contact Information

For any inquiries regarding this procurement, please contact:

Ryan Wong, Contract Authority
[RYAN.WONG@forces.gc.ca](mailto:RYAN.WONG@forces.gc.ca)
Defense Research and Development Canada, Ottawa Research Centre
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa ON K1A 0K2

The RFP is issued under the solicitation number W6369-23-X030, amendment number 3. The procurement deadline is March 6th, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST).  You can download supporting documents below:

- [Request for Proposal (RFP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/17/96a048df948525172f201065d164bbcc/w6369-23-x030_-_rfp_en.pdf)
